format:
Welcome to the
HOME PAGE!


Insert an user ID and greenhouse ID to receive information and statistics
about them

func:
msg['action'] = "subscribe"
# da aggiungere alla fine il sensorType
#msg['topic']= str(msg['payload']['id'])+"/"+str(msg['payload']['greenHouseID'])+"/environment/temperature"

msg['topic'] = "IoT_project/group29/greenhouse1/temperature"
return msg

msg['action'] = "subscribe"
# da aggiungere alla fine il sensorType

msg['topic'] = "IoT_project/group29/greenhouse1/humidity"
return msg

info: This flow is to create a new user. We use POST

func:
query =  "?id="+ str(msg['payload']['id'])

data = {
    'userName' : msg['payload']['userName'],
    'password' : msg['payload']['password'],
    'id' : msg['payload']['id'],
    'name' : msg['payload']['name'],
    'surname' : msg['payload']['surname'],
    'email_addresses' : msg['payload']['email_addresses'],
    'country' : msg['payload']['country']
}

msg = {'payload' : data, 'query' : query}
return msg
